channel.title: SteverX - New RsPs - 24/7 online! vps hosted DDos protected
channel.description:
[staffspots still open and needed!!]
[size=14pt]Hello everyone! Today i wanna show you all the 718 private server SteverX. First of all its vps hosted, so 24/7 online and 0% lagg! [/size]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34eba52.jpg[/img]
[center] Our Website : http://www.steverx.biz Our Forums : http://www.steverx.biz/forums Our Webclient : http://http://steverx.biz/webclient.html Our Voting : http://http://steverx.biz/vote Our donating : http://http://steverx.biz/donate.html [/center]
[size=24pt]A small introduction [/size] [size=14pt] SteverX is an enhanced server, with nothing but uniqueness. From 100% construction, to troll invasion minigame, we assure our players something fun for them. Daily updates assure we always have the best and the brightest content within our server.[/size]
[size=18pt]BOSSES[/size] - Nex - Godwars Dungeon - Tormented Demons - King black dragon - Corpal beast - Sea troll queen - Kalphite Queen - Revenants - Frost dragons - Dagganoth kings [color=red]- And lot more [/color]
[size=18pt]MINIGAMES[/size] - Queen black Dragon - The Hunger games - Troll minigame - Fully working castle wars - Clan wars all 3 portals! [White / Red / Purple ] - Domination Tower - Fight caves - Fight Kiln - Duel arena [color=red]- lot more[/color]
[size=14pt] Warrior’s Guild: The classic warrior’s guild involving animating armors, you kill these for their tokens. The tokens are then used for the top floor for to defeat the Cyclops for their defenders.
Duel Arena: Fun or Stake, its at your own risk while staking, for proof record it if u think your oppent is gonna scam, or use Middleman, staffteam or trusted players.
Castle Wars: The aim of Castle Wars is to take the enemy's standard, or flag, from their castle and return it to the standard in your own castle's keep, gaining 1 point each time. So Steal flagss and keep your own!
Fight Caves & Fight Pits: Jad, one of the strongest and most fearful bosses Relentless has to offer. Players will be rewarded with Tokkul for playing this minigame, and if they manage to defeat TzTok-Jad, they will be rewarded with the fire cape [/size]
[size=18pt]VOTING REWARDS[/size] - 2x Spin tickets [working squeel of fortune] - 500 archery tickets for vote shop - flower seeds - Pieces of eight [custom slayer at this moment] - 15m cash [color=red]- and alot more[/color]
[size=12pt]Some Screenshots From SteverX[/size]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2eg5u6g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2my11cz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/ibfh47.png[/img]
[size=14pt] At this moment we have a stable player amount of 11-15 players! Can you help us grow the server! come and check us out! we would like to meet you soon ingame![/size]
[size=18pt]~ Maurice [/size]
[center] Our Website : http://www.steverx.biz Our Forums : http://www.steverx.biz/forums Our Webclient : http://http://steverx.biz/webclient.html Our Voting : http://http://steverx.biz/vote Our donating : http://http://steverx.biz/donate.html [/center]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34eba52.jpg[/img]

item.title: SteverX - New RsPs - 24/7 online! vps hosted DDos protected
item.dc:creator: @maurice-h maurice-h
item.description:
@maurice-h wrote:

[staffspots still open and needed!!]

[size=14pt]Hello everyone!
Today i wanna show you all the 718 private server SteverX.
First of all its vps hosted, so 24/7 online and 0% lagg!
[/size]

[center]
Our Website : http://www.steverx.biz
Our Forums : http://www.steverx.biz/forums
Our Webclient : http://http://steverx.biz/webclient.html
Our Voting : http://http://steverx.biz/vote
Our donating : http://http://steverx.biz/donate.html
[/center]

[size=24pt]A small introduction
[/size]
[size=14pt]
SteverX is an enhanced server, with nothing but uniqueness. From 100% construction, to troll invasion minigame, we assure our players something fun for them. Daily updates assure we always have the best and the brightest content within our server.[/size]

[size=18pt]BOSSES[/size]

  • Nex
  • Godwars Dungeon
  • Tormented Demons
  • King black dragon
  • Corpal beast
  • Sea troll queen
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Revenants
  • Frost dragons
  • Dagganoth kings
    [color=red]- And lot more
    [/color]

[size=18pt]MINIGAMES[/size]

  • Queen black Dragon
  • The Hunger games
  • Troll minigame
  • Fully working castle wars
  • Clan wars all 3 portals! [White / Red / Purple ]
  • Domination Tower
  • Fight caves
  • Fight Kiln
  • Duel arena
    [color=red]- lot more[/color]

[size=14pt]
Warrior’s Guild: The classic warrior’s guild involving animating armors, you kill these for their tokens. The tokens are then used for the top floor for to defeat the Cyclops for their defenders.

Duel Arena: Fun or Stake, its at your own risk while staking, for proof record it if u think your oppent is gonna scam, or use Middleman, staffteam or trusted players.

Castle Wars: The aim of Castle Wars is to take the enemy’s standard, or flag, from their castle and return it to the standard in your own castle’s keep, gaining 1 point each time. So Steal flagss and keep your own!

Fight Caves & Fight Pits: Jad, one of the strongest and most fearful bosses Relentless has to offer. Players will be rewarded with Tokkul for playing this minigame, and if they manage to defeat TzTok-Jad, they will be rewarded with the fire cape
[/size]

[size=18pt]VOTING REWARDS[/size]

  • 2x Spin tickets [working squeel of fortune]
  • 500 archery tickets for vote shop
  • flower seeds
  • Pieces of eight [custom slayer at this moment]
  • 15m cash
    [color=red]- and alot more[/color]

[size=12pt]Some Screenshots From SteverX[/size]

[size=14pt]
At this moment we have a stable player amount of 11-15 players!
Can you help us grow the server!
come and check us out! we would like to meet you soon ingame![/size]

[size=18pt]~ Maurice
[/size]

[center]
Our Website : http://www.steverx.biz
Our Forums : http://www.steverx.biz/forums
Our Webclient : http://http://steverx.biz/webclient.html
Our Voting : http://http://steverx.biz/vote
